entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 March 2023
